felicity noun
(SUITABLE WORDS)
[ U ] the fact that words or remarks are suitable and express what was intended: As a songwriter, he combined great linguistic felicity with an ear for a tune.
[ C usually plural ] a word or remark that is suitable or right and expresses well the intended thought or feeling: Her article contained one or two verbal felicities that will stay in my mind for years.
